/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling city street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, giving a sense of the towering buildings that line the street. These structures, painted in hues of yellow and orange, rise high into the clear blue sky, punctuated by a smattering of clouds. The street itself is a hive of activity, with cars and buses moving along its length, adding a dynamic element to the scene. In the distance, construction cranes can be seen, hinting at the ongoing development and growth of the city. The image is bathed in the light of day, highlighting the vibrancy and energy of urban life in Beijing.
